sentence.Network_en: Solitude was no excuse for sloppiness.
Miss Furniss could not abide sloppiness.
sentence.Network_cn: 弗尼斯小姐受不了马马虎虎的作风。

sentence.Network_en: The choice of Sarah Palin epitomised the sloppiness.
sentence.Network_cn: 选择佩琳作为竞选伙伴凸显草率.

list.abs: 如今在西礁镇上，最繁荣的Duval街，一家叫“邋遢乔（sloppy joe）”（Sloppy Joe）的酒吧餐厅便是靠海明威当招牌，大发观光财。他的虬髯大头四 …
调羹汉堡(sloppy joe) 材料：牛肉糜8两，洋葱1个切碎，大蒜一头切碎，香草末1茶匙，番茄酱2汤匙（不是番茄沙司而是2元1罐的梅林 …
sloping 坡降sloppy cut 不合格馏分slops 污油
进出口货物名称中英对照(201) ... sloper 铲坡机 sloppy hat 软毡帽 slot damper 槽隙阻尼器.

entry.def: If you describe someone's work or activities as sloppy, you mean they have been done in a careless and lazy way.

example.ex: He has little patience for sloppy work from colleagues...
example.tran: 他对同事们草草敷衍的工作鲜有耐心。

example.ex: His language is disjointed and sloppy.
example.tran: 他的语言支离破碎，混乱不堪。

entry.tran: 伤感浪漫的;无病呻吟的
entry.def: If you describe someone or something as sloppy, you mean that they are sentimental and romantic.

example.ex: It's ideal for people who like a sloppy movie.
example.tran: 对于喜欢伤感电影的人来说，这部影片再合适不过了。
一场风花雪月的爱情故事

auth_sentence.content: Indie bands hit wrong notes and sing out of tune all the time, their sloppiness signifying authenticity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Indie bands hit wrong notes and sing out of tune all the time, their sloppiness signifying authenticity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Indie bands hit wrong notes and sing out of tune all the time, their sloppiness signifying authenticity.

auth_sentence.content: Perhaps through sloppiness in exposition, it seems to applaud lapses of self-control in general, which is a bad thing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Perhaps through sloppiness in exposition, it seems to applaud lapses of self-control in general, which is a bad thing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Perhaps through sloppiness in exposition, it seems to applaud lapses of self-control in general, which is a bad thing.

auth_sentence.content: You can't have confidence in anything if there's such a tolerance of sloppiness.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can't have confidence in anything if there's such a tolerance of sloppiness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can't have confidence in anything if there's such a tolerance of sloppiness.
